description: Mobile development fundamentals (iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter)

nodes.name: App Lifecycle
nodes.description: Foreground/background/suspended states, lifecycle callbacks, state preservation
challenge_hooks: What happens to network requests when an app is backgrounded on iOS?
When should you save state â€” onPause or onStop?
What is the difference between a killed app and a suspended app?

nodes.name: State Management
nodes.description: Local vs global state, unidirectional data flow, reactive patterns
challenge_hooks: Why does unidirectional data flow make debugging easier?
When does local component state become a problem?
What is the difference between ephemeral and app state?

nodes.name: Navigation Patterns
nodes.description: Stack navigation, tab navigation, deep linking, back stack management
challenge_hooks: How do deep links differ from universal links?
What happens to the back stack when you deep link into a nested screen?
When would you use modal navigation vs stack navigation?

nodes.name: Performance & Rendering
nodes.description: Frame budget, Jank, lazy loading, image optimization, list virtualization
challenge_hooks: What is the 16ms frame budget and what happens when you exceed it?
Why does a FlatList outperform ScrollView for long lists?
What causes jank and how do you diagnose it?

nodes.name: Offline-First & Sync
nodes.description: Local persistence, optimistic updates, conflict resolution, background sync
challenge_hooks: What is an optimistic update and what do you do if the server rejects it?
How do you handle conflict resolution when two clients edit the same data offline?
When would you use SQLite vs a key-value store on mobile?

nodes.name: Push Notifications
nodes.description: APNs, FCM, notification permissions, rich notifications, background delivery
challenge_hooks: What is a silent push notification and when would you use it?
Why can't iOS guarantee delivery of background notifications?
What permissions must the user grant and at what point should you ask?

nodes.name: iOS vs Android Differences
nodes.description: UX patterns, permissions model, distribution, sandboxing, gestures
challenge_hooks: Why does iOS require explicit permission for push notifications but Android (pre-13) doesn't?
How do back gestures differ between iOS and Android and how does your navigation handle this?
What is app sandboxing and how does it differ between iOS and Android?

nodes.name: Mobile Accessibility
nodes.description: VoiceOver, TalkBack, Dynamic Type, touch target sizes, semantic labels
challenge_hooks: What is the minimum touch target size recommended by Apple and Google?
How does Dynamic Type work and how do you support it in layouts?
When should you use accessibilityLabel vs accessibilityHint?
